thread.title: Edward Hempel

author: Edward Hempel
title: Edward Hempel
text: I was having a hard time trying to find a balance for the front bumper of my 2000 model Mazda B 2500 when I looked on their website they were the only ones that had one I then ordered it they told me it would not come for 4 weeks because of backorder but for somehow or another it was in the shop within five days I want to thank you for all the extra support thank you very much for all your help very good website
